typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DescriptorId as integer,
		Namespace as string,
		CodeValue as string,
		ShortDescription as string,
		Description as string,
		PriorDescriptorId as integer,
		EffectiveBeginDate as date,
		EffectiveEndDate as date,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Desc
source(output(
		SexDescriptorId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Sex
Desc, Sex join(DescriptorId == SexDescriptorId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joindesc
joindesc sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> edfidb
